message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. My initial offer is $1,300,000, which I think is a fair price considering its worth to you is $1,500,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I see the value in the product, but $1,300,000 is a little steep for me.  Would you consider $1,100,000?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see the value of the product is high for you, but I also need to ensure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,200,000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $1,500,000.
